cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Foreign Affairs on May 19, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 3261, To Repeal the Authorization for Use of Military Force Against Iraq Resolution

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 84 (Friday, May 14, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. SPANBERGER:
H.R. 3261.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article l, Section 8
[Page H2357]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

title: To repeal the Authorization for Use of Military Force Against Iraq Resolution.
